NetBIOS.Name: NetBIOSDomainName
NetBIOS.comment: Replace 'NetBIOSDomainName' with the Authentication Domain which will be used as default Domain while changing the password, example: 'NetBIOSDomainName\Username'

DomainContorller.comment: Add all the active Domain Controllers with FQDN or IP addeess. You can also give single Domain Controller

PrintServer.comment: Similar to the domain contollers above you can add multuple print server with FQDN or IP. Give multiple print server for redundancy (not mandatory to mention multiple server)

Media.comment: (Optional) Add the path if you have any
